attributes.action: Give Captain Tom Moore an OBE in the Birthday honours and for 100th Birthday.
attributes.additional_details: Captain Tom Moore has raised millions of pounds for the NHS in a time of national crisis and in doing so is inspiring a world
attributes.background: I want the Government to endorse a knighthood for Captain Tom Moore for his fund raising efforts for the NHS and being an inspiration to the world.

rejection.details:
We know lots of people want to petition for Colonel Moore to receive an honour, but the Government will only accept individual nominations, not petitions, so we can’t publish your petition.

To submit a nomination for an honour, visit: http://www.gov.uk/honours/
